programme.title: Pat Buchanan
programme.short_synopsis: Is a vote for Pat Buchanan in the New Hampshire primary a vote against George Bush?
programme.medium_synopsis: Following the New Hampshire primary, Alistair Cooke profiles Republican candidate Pat Buchanan, and asks whether a vote for Buchanan is really a vote against George Bush.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
